meanings.definition: Situated in or directed toward the south.
meanings.sent1: The sun sets in the southern sky.
meanings.sent2: I live in a small town in the southern part of the country.
meanings.sent3: The penguin decided to take a vacation to the southern hemisphere for a change.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm as a southern breeze.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset painted the sky in a beautiful southern glow.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of the South.
meanings.sent1: She cooked a delicious southern meal for us.
meanings.sent2: The southern accent is distinct and charming.
meanings.sent3: The cat insisted on only eating southern-style fried chicken.
meanings.sent4: His manners were as polite as a true southern gentleman.
meanings.sent5: The southern hospitality made us feel right at home.
